sentences.sContent: a question that continues to puzzle scientists
sentences.sCn: 一直困扰科学家的问题

sentences.sContent: He was puzzled by the reactions to his remark.
sentences.sCn: 他对自己的话引起的反应感到困惑不解。

sentences.sContent: What puzzles me is why his books are so popular.
sentences.sCn: 令我不解的是，他的书为什么如此受欢迎。
